bs-uemodulepdfrecursive-extension-descri: Enables recursive export of pages into PDF format.
bs-uemodulepdfrecursive-widgetlink-recur: Export this page and all linked pages as PDF.
right-uemodulepdfrecursive-export: exporting a page, including all linked pages, to PDF
action-uemodulepdfrecursive-export: Exporting a page, including all linked pages, to PDF
